Quick question for you. Here's some common pain-points when it comes to searching for jobs. Can you rank the top three that resonate most with you?
[1] I don't know what I want to do
[2] The search query is unable to reflect what I want
[3] There aren't enough / any relevant search results from my query
[4] It's hard to know which jobs I will enjoy. I wish there was more information about the job
[5] It takes a long time to apply to a job
[6] I don't hear back from jobs I'm applying to
[7] It's difficult to keep track of the status of my applications
[8] I want to be applying more frequently, but I'm not
[9] My resume & cover letter are not a good reflection of my value as a candidate. I wish I could present more information about my skills and/or personality
This is Tim Connors
Hey! I would say 6, 3, and 9

(Assuming they're real jobs, and not expired). You would have to fill out those apps yourself, but we would put in the work to find them for you!
